import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Category } from 'src/app/Model/category.model'; import { CategoryService } from 'src/app/Model/Services/category/category.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-item', templateUrl: './add-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-item.component.css'] }) export class AddItemComponent implements OnInit{ allCategories: Category[] = []; constructor(private categoryService: CategoryService) { } ngOnInit() { } fetchAllCategories() { this.categoryService.getCategories().subscribe((data) => { this.allCategories = [...data] }) } }
